title: Iubire ca in filme
overview: Ioana, a 23-year-old girl is suffering terribly after the death of her parents. She takes care of her sister, Raluca, making money from a bar, hiding this from her sister, lying to her that he is a psychologist. The situation becomes more difficult when Raluca falls in love with Drago»ô, and her best friend falls in love with the same man. Ioana knows Stefan he falls in love with. He wants to get rid of his possessive mother's influence, asking for help from Ioana, believing that she is a psychologist. The boy's mother wants to marry Adina, who is fighting with Ioana for the boy's love. Zuzu, the owner of the bar where Ioana works, joins Ioana for better and for worse, both she and the other girls.
